author: iheart.com
title: Sail Away with Jamie Roberts and 98.3TRY | 98.3 WTRY
text:
Book your Cruise with AAA Northway and Sail with Jaime Roberts and 98-3 TRY on an exciting 9 Night Listener Cruise to Bermuda and the Eastern Caribbean – aboard Royal Caribbean’s Liberty of the Seas®!
Join Jaime Roberts on an unforgettable journey for nine nights of non-stop excitement with some spectacular destinations along the way including – Bermuda, San Maarten, San Juan and Labadee! Sail roundtrip from Cape Liberty, New Jersey – Departing May 29, 2025 – for 9 Nights.
On the ship, there’s three pools, a water park – featuring exhilarating slides like Tidal Wave, and the very exciting Flow-Rider Surfing Simulator!
Indulge yourself—enjoy many fantastic dining experiences included at a wide variety of eateries. Add in fun like endless entertainment options! From captivating theater shows and live music to even movie screenings. Imagine yourselves savoring the new culinary delights at Sabor and Giovanni's Table and then, unwinding at one of the ship's many bars and lounges.
With panoramic ocean view staterooms and vibrant onboard activities, your Royal Caribbean cruise to Bermuda and the Eastern Caribbean, promises many unforgettable memories. So, join Jaime as she sets sail!
Discover the excitement awaiting you aboard our next amazing WTRY cruise!
Where are we going? Bermuda, discover a history-filled paradise full of pink sand beaches!
Your journey begins with an enchanting visit to Bermuda , where vibrant history and stunning landscapes await. Explore the historic Royal Navy Dockyard, relax on pink sand beaches and snorkel in crystal-clear waters filled with colorful marine life. Whether you're wandering the charming streets of Hamilton or discovering the wonders of Crystal Caves, Bermuda offers an idyllic blend of adventure and relaxation.
Experience the cosmopolitan charm of Philipsburg in St. Maarten!
Next, experience the cosmopolitan charm of Philipsburg in St. Maarten, where Dutch and French influences create a unique cultural tapestry. Stroll along the picturesque Great Bay Beach, shop at duty-free boutiques on Front Street, or savor delectable Caribbean cuisine at waterfront restaurants. Dive into water sports like snorkeling on crystal-clear waters. With its stunning beaches, lively evenings, and welcoming atmosphere, Philipsburg is a captivating destination that promises unforgettable memories.
Discover the vibrant culture and rich history of San Juan, Puerto Rico!
Wander through the colorful streets of Old San Juan , where cobblestone pathways lead to iconic landmarks like El Morro and San Cristobal forts. Immerse yourself in the lively local cuisine, music, and art, or relax on stunning beaches such as Condado and Isla Verde. Discover the city's rich cultural heritage in its colonial architecture, lively cafes, and quaint plazas—while exploring museums and unique shops scattered throughout the old city. Hunt for artisan products and one-of-a-kind souvenirs that reflect the vibrant spirit of Puerto Rico. Whether you're exploring historical sites, or indulging in modern amenities, San Juan is sure to captivate!
And… Yes! Your Own Private Paradise in Labadee, Haiti!
Nestled along the northern coast, Royal Caribbean's exclusive private paradise is a stunning destination, framed by pristine beaches, lush tropical landscapes and the sparkling Caribbean Sea.
Adventure seekers can soar high above the water on the Dragon’s Breath Flight Line , the world's longest over-water zipline, or kayak along the coastline to discover hidden coves and secluded spots! For those looking to relax, lounge on the soft sands of Adrenaline Beach, where you can sip on a refreshing drink while soaking in the sun.
Labadee also offers a vibrant local culture, with opportunities to shop for handcrafted artisan goods, sample delicious local flavors, or even enjoy a traditional Haitian dance performance! Whether you're snorkeling in crystal-clear waters, exploring the tropical terrain on a nature trail, or unwinding in a private cabana, Labadee provides the perfect blend of excitement and relaxation—a memorable finale to an unforgettable journey!
Cruise Details:
Sail roundtrip from Cape Liberty, NJ – departing May 29, 2025 – for 9 Nights
